title: Superb location, excellent staff
review: We have spent four nights at the grand hotel liberty in riva del Garda . I had read the reviews prior to booking so my expectations had not been too high on the attic rooms . However the hotel needs to make decisions about these rooms . The bathrooms are unsuitable , like other reviews the bath leaked so had to put towels on the floor , you cannot stand up in the shower as the roof slopes , no shower curtain or screen to protect the floor , a definite musty smell , perhaps this is because the bath is leaking . ! The room  was dark , old fashioned cover on the bed and a tiny window , much like a cell window . Positive s are the function rooms , bar and bar service , a good breakfast too. The hotel needs  to make a decision about using these rooms for Internet bookings as the …

title: Bathroom Shuffle
review: This is a lovely hotel. Central. The communal areas have character and are well looked after. The food is good and some nights it was very good. The staff in the restaurant are excellent and the whole hotel has a calm relaxing atmosphere.  Everywhere is clean.  The pool area is tidy but no bar service, bit of a shame.  However, if you stay in Room 405 you will be sadly disappointed at the lack of any character and the bathroom will drive you mad due to its bad design. If you want to pick something up in the shower or girls shave you legs you will have to open the doors. The sink is far too big so all week you will have to shuffle along to the toilet. The room is too small to dry yourself in and you can only get one person at a time in there. No real place for your toiletries. …

title: Stylish place in very beautiful town
review: Good afternoon and thanks for your review !  I understand your position about the toilet, not all are same, depend in which area of the hotel you are and which type of room.  We always say that we will update some rooms/bathroom, we really want and we are waiting some better period of economy to make this upgrade  Thanks a lot for now

title: Great Hotel, Wonderful Staff - Fantastic Holiday!
review: We spent 2 very pleasent nights in Grand Hotel. We deciced for economic room (attic) and it was good call.  The room was spacious with comfortable bed - the only drawbacks may have been small roof window and only a little glass screen on the thub as a shower - not very comfortable for having shower.  Apart from that - everyting was 100% fine. Very helpful staff, very rich breakfasts, pleasent SPA area.  The outdoor pool seems to be too small for these quantity of visitors - only two umbrellas around with two beds for each - were "booked" by thrown towels I think starting from 5 or 6 a.m.Too few sun beds as well - people had to lay down on the grass. Not good for such a place. Fortunately SPA area was empty so I could have the pool just for myself :)  Hotel is absolutely perfect…

title: This hotel is always good.
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lot for your holiday with us and your stay ! We will take note about the garden with sun umbrella and we already planned for 2014 to put some more and also more sun beds.  Thanks a lot again and see you

title: A LOVELY CLASSIC HOTEL
review: What can I say, we have just returned home from the most amazing fortnight in the Hotel Grand Liberty and it was an amazing experience!  Previously we have always self catered, but we decided this year to splash out a bit on a half board holiday in a hotel. We didn't really know what to expect, but whatever our expectations were the Hotel Grand Liberty surpassed them! The only problem we had for the whole two weeks was when we arrived - the twin room for our son (20) and daughter (18) was a double! However, they soon found them a room with twin beds and sorted their room out for next morning. Apart from that, all was perfect.  So, what was so good:- > Rooms were clean, comfortable and air conditioned. > Wifi throughout the hotel. > Swimming pool was clean and a joy to swim in. >…

title: Good position - nice pool
review: Stayed three nights here on B&B. cannot fault the hotel or the service. We were lucky enough to have a two storey room over looking the pool which had a separate lounge area and excellent bathroom. Breakfast very good and staff all very helpful.

title: Don't stay in Room 303
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lot for your comment !  Reading your review you were allocated in a Suite room, on two level and jacuzzi bathroom.  Thanks again and enjoy end summer !

title: Amazing
review: Stayed in your Hotel recently with the Travel Department , when we arrived were told we were on 3rd Floor but the minute we stepped out of the lift the fusty musty smell was terrible,such a disappointment when we went into our room 303, it was disgusting I went straight to Reception but was told you were fully booked up and we could not have another room for 2days. After 2days in that he'll hole we got a room on the ground floor which was fine, but all I say to you is please, please do not put anyone else into that Room 303 until it has got a complete overhaul,and with no windows opening on that floor the smell is terrible.

title: Excellent
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lot for your reply.  We received your comment with TD and we are going to fix the small problmes you find in the room.  We cannot understand the comment about the smell, we went there and we didn't find nothing strange, also no other complaint about Guest.  Thanks a lot and hope to see you again !

title: Great location, great food
review: A fantastic Hotel, in a beautiful part of the world. The staff were fantastic, "George Clooney", Maurice and the restaurant staff were brilliant, the reception staff were very helpful and the cleaning staff were great. Had a great week with my sister, doing lots of walking, swimming and sailing on the lake and eating wonderful food produced by the hotel. Hoping to go back in the future.

title: An Ideal Location
review: This hotel is ideally situated and although it is on the main promenade, the rooms are all soundproofed and in any case, it is a good idea to ask for a room at the back of the hotel. We certainly were happy we stayed here and not in one of the hotels on the Piazzas where although they had a wonderful view overlooking the Lake, the noise of the restaurants and bars and continuous activity of the boats going in and out, would be a total deterrent.  The staff are all really friendly and speak good English.  The buffet breakfast is excellent (but don’t expect English tea!) – a great selection of hot and cold to choose from, as well as breads, cakes, croissants etc.  The food in the diningroom was good with plenty of choice and their main barman could serve up cocktails and drink of…

title: Grand Hotel Liberty
review: Good afternoon,  thanks for your stay and thanks for your wonderful comment !  I am sure we will see again in the future when you come again to Lake Garda ! It's always wonderful 12 months a year !  Thanks a lot

title: Nice alternative to lake front
review: Returned from Riva del Garda and the lovely Grand Hotel Liberty today. The hotel has an ideal location. Across the road is a large supermarket and pharmacy for any bits and bobs you may require or have forgotten! The centre and marina is less than ten minutes walk and there are plenty of shops along the way to tempt you.  The hotel decor is dated but it has old world charm and is spotless. The terraces and pool are nicely arranged with a grass area with trees for shelter while lounging.  We were on a half board basis and while the food was not great it was more our taste than the quality. One thing for sure the staff were excellent and could not do enough for you. The went out of their way to ensure you we're happy and I could not praise them enough particularly Bruno (hope I…

title: lovely and with emotion
review: Good afternoon,  really thanks a lot for your review ! I will print it and show to all Staff !  I am happy you enjoyed your holiday with us and we wait you for next time :)   Have a nice summer !

title: great hotel with lots of character
review: Beatiful looking hotel with nice sized rooms which are air conditioned and very clean. The spa is also fantastic.  Apart from the slightly prickly middle aged lady on the front desk all the staff were lovely and welcoming. Great base for Riva and surrounding area plus it has parking. Can be a bit noisy on weekends till about 1am if there is a wedding on which we experienced on the first night but the rest of the stay was quiet

title: Lovely hotel and location
review: I stayed her with my wife for a week as part of an escorted tours holiday with The Travel Department in August 2011. As some other reviews have mentioned, the hotel is fairly old looking in places, but this did not have any effect on our stay. We were on a half board basis and the food and service were excellent. The breakfast was a buffet, and the dinners were three courses, but exactly the right size in each portion. There was an outdoor pool, and also a fitness centre with indoor pool underneath the hotel which You have to pay extra for. The views from our second floor room were beautiful. Step outside the hotel and the views of both the mountains and Lake Garda are simply stunning. We could only find one ''normal'' bar where You could just sit inside and go up to the bar…

title: great hotel and great holiday with travel dept.
review: Good evening,  thanks a lor for your review ! All our publis areas, bar, swimming pools, fitness, beauty center, terraces are all new. We are now going to refurbish some rooms in the next season, as soon as we can.  Hope to see you again after 2011 holiday ! Thanks

title: our holiday 2013
review: Great hotel -- my son remarked 'this is like one of those places that Poirot probably stayed in to solve a mystery' and that kinda summed the character of the place up.  Old world meets new, lots of high ceilings and beautiful old furniture, yet very modern too. Rooms scrupulously clean, beds comfy, nice modern shower.  free safe, TV, hairdryer etc.  If i had just one little gripe it would be that the only english stations were the news channels, and whilst you only tend to put it on for a bit of background noise before bedtime, who really wants to hear the (usually bad) news on hol.  Some people said that they missed tea/coffee in the rooms.  That all said I couldn't fault this hotel at all.  The restaurant was really good, lovely cuisine and a good choices, breakfast was the…

title: Wonderful place to stay
review: Good evening  thanks a lot for your amazing and full review about hotel and surroudings !  I can only say thank you for the post and will give your message to all Staff ! We have recently changed our TV and now we are going to put more channels on our selection, if we can also a english speaking movie channel, and not only news, as you say now normally always bad.  Thanks and I am sure we will see you again in the near future !

title: Great Holiday
review: We stayed here for 1 week with the travel department on a half board basis , first week in June . Food on the whole was good ,esp the Ravioli , breakfast was the same everyday . We had  room  306  on the third floor with 2 amazing views . 1 of the lake and 1 of the mountains  The bedroom was very big .The staff were very friendly . The pool was very cold , only for the hardy . You are a 5 minute walk from town and the lake .

title: Wi-FI
review: Just spent a week and enjoyed my stay. The reception staff were very helpful but were unable to resolve my problem of getting a wi-fi connection in my room No 222 despite their advertisement stating that it had wi-fi connection in every room.  It was no problem as we just went down to the bar and had drink and used the wi-fi connection there, it just annoyed me that they know the wi-fi does not reach all rooms but still advertise the opposite. Lake Garda is a great place with good shops and a nice lake front with no shortage of coffee or ice cream stops.

title: Fabulous holiday,didn't want it to end.
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lot for your review, we honestly had a big trouble on the wifi system during that days, I am really sorry for the trouble and now we finally have fixed all.  Hope to see you again in our hotel in the future  Thanks a lot

title: Hotel Liberty 22 May-29 May 2013
review: Just back from a week in hotel Liberty,with travel dept.this hotel is full of character and the staff members are all so polite and quite witty. Every night at dinner was a ball the waiters kept us entertained and we were constantly having a laugh with them.the food in the evening was sooooooon good ,I miss it already. Would have liked to see melon and strawberries etc at breakfast thou a great selection of cereals and breads.yes the rooms are a bit dated ,we stayed on the 3rd floor in an attic type room  no 301 it was a bit dark as the windows were small,thou rest of hotel was fabulous and so were the staff, loved every minute of it.would definitely return to this charming hotel and its charming staff.hope to see you soon!

title: Below expectations
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lot for your wonderful review !  I will pass your message to all Staff and sure they will be happy.  I hope to see you again in the future with us and I wish you a nice summer !  Thanks

title: hotel liberty
review: We chose the grand Hotel Liberty 4* over another 3*hotel located right in the heart of Riva  on the assumption that the facilities would better suit my wife who is partially disabled.  We have been to Riva a number of times before and knew exactly where it was located and as such just within her walking distance capability. First impressions were that EU rules regarding disabled access did not apply as we were met with a flight of steps to the main entrance.  I only discovered later in the week that there was a small wheelchair elevator tucked around the corner which was not operating. As part of the Travel Department group we were allocated a room (228) on the second floor.   Well, this was the tiniest room we have ever stayed in.  There was a double bed, sliding door wardrobes…

title: fantastic hotel
review: We have just returned from a week at Hotel Liberty booked through Thomas Cook.. The hotel is wonderful and is central to all the attractions of Riva. The food was absolutely delicious with a good selection of dishes each day. The staff in the dining room very attentive and in fact all of the staff were very friendly,making our stay memorable. We had a very comfortable and spacious bedroom on the first floor with a balcony overlooking the garden. We would not hesitate to return to this hotel.

title: front of house Reception
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lor for your reply !  I really appreciate your comment and will give your message to all Staff, we all hope to see you again in our hotel, summer, winter or when you like, we are always open  Thanks a lot

title: Dissapointing spa with Smart box
review: My wife and I recently spent 7 nights at this hotel in early April when we traveled with The Travel Department. We looked at the literature in the hotel brochure in our room and the following was stated. "In order to preserve the tranquil atmosphere of the "Beauty and wellness Spa" children are permitted only between the hours of 9.00am and 12.00 noon and only if accompanied by a parent or guardian". Having used this facility on three separate days at 4pm, 5.15pm and 5pm and had to put up with very young children being taught how to swim with a lot of screaming going on, we decided to report this to the Main Reception desk upstairs only to be informed that they no longer enforce this policy. The relaxation aspect of the pool was completely lost and we were told that they forgot…

title: Beautiful location, loved the hotel and staff
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lot for your review, I remember this situation because the Staff tell me about your complaint, you are true we forgot to take away from our info that children can go in the pool if together with parents.  We would like to give possibility to all, also family, to relax and enjoy our SPA.  Thanks a lot anyway for your stay and hope to see you again

title: "Perfect Holiday"
review: My husband bought me a luxury spa smart box as a gift which included one night accommodation. After researching various options we decided to go to the grand hotel liberty as it seemed like it would be a nice hotel. The hotel itself is very grand, although our room was very average. We were hoping to be spoit in the spa but that too was disappointing. It was super packed full of people. There were not enough sun beds to rest on. The Turkish bath was tiny and wasn't working properly so there was no steam.  The sauna only had space or 4 people and was always busy. You had to wait to get in and te main pool was big but again packed full of other guests. Even the 25 min massage wasn't very good. My untrained husband can o a better job and to top it off our messages were barely 20…

title: Nice Hotel stunning Location
review: Just back from a 5 day trip to Lake Garda with the Travel Department.   The Hotel is ideally located not far from the Harbour and its stunning scenery.    Our rooms were in the newer part of the hotel, the rooms were an adequate size and were clean.   The only gripe I would have with the room was the shower in the bathroom.    There was only a tiny glass shower screen, so when you had a shower, the whole bathroom had a shower with you!   We stayed on a half board basis, the breakfast is a buffet breakfast with plenty to choose from.    The dinner menu consisted of a choice of starters, main meals and desserts.   On the whole the food was quite good, but for a 4* Hotel, there is definitely room for improvement.    The hotel staff were attentive and polite except for one…

title: ruined our honeymoon
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lot for your review first of all !  I am happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us, but if I can ask please, write to my attention regarding this waiter that was not helpful or polite. Our staff work with us from many years but if something is wrong, is nice for me to know to fix the problem.  Thanks a lot and hope to see you again with us  Alessandro

title: Very good deal for low season
review: Stayed here last October on our honeymoon. We booked throught he travel department. When booking I was advised I could pay extra for a suite and a little bit more again for a "Bridal suite".. We checked in late and went straight to bed as we had been trevelling all day... The next day i inspected the room... such a let down... there was an upstairs, with the bed and toilet and downstairs table couch t etc. My husband has an on going knee injury so to go all the way upsatirs to go to the toilet was a pain ... our bed as two single beds pushed together... very annoying when you want to cuddle up at night, you almost fall between the two bed... After a day of the whole room bugging us both i complained to reception. I was informed i paid for the "floor space" after i asked was that…

title: Perfect holiday
review: Good afternoon,  really sorry to read you review, I think it doesn't change if I reply to  all your list now after your holiday, but may I ask :  Did you ask a room desription when you booked a suite ? Every operator we work know that there are 2 floors and there is a jacuzzi, so no very indicated for old people or who have walking problem. Same also for the shower..  Sorry a lot about the mattress but really in all hotel we all have single beds and not a full bed.  About the Lady put in a third floor, we also have this kind of rooms, with a different price and people, same for the suite, can see the room destription before booking.  Thanks a lot

title: Traditional Italian hotel in a beautiful town.
review: I spent last weekend in this Hotel and it was my second time there. I reccomend it for low season especially for January. For about 90 euro you get a queen size bedroom with free access to the wellness until 10 p.m., continental breakfast, late check out (12 a.m.), and free access to the wellness also the entire day of check out. Breakfast is good with a big buffet. Sundays' morning are crowded in the wellness but late night is simly amazing. Definitely worth trying it.

title: Grand Hotel superb accommodatin and location
review: Visited the Grand Hotel August 2011.  A beautiful hotel located in an ideal location with friendly staff.  The room was small and maybe a little dated but efficient.  While I did hear of one complaint about accommodation that was dealt with immediately and to the guest's satisfaction.  Both the breakfast and evening meal were of high quality.  A charming period hotel placed in the cente of Riva literally yards from Lake Garda.  A stunning location matched by excellent accommodatin

title: Finally found my idyallic  holiday location
review: Good evening,  thanks a lot for your comment !  Yes you are right, we always hear Guests and try to do the best to make their holiday fanstatic !  I hope to see you again next season Thanks

title: Charming Hotel, Perfect Setting
review: I  first visited Grand Hotel Liberty with The Travel Dept in October with my sister. I loved it so much I returned on my own for the Christmas and New holidays.  It most certainly did not disappoint.  My room, with a lovely balcony with a view to the majestic Alps, was a dream.  The Staff could not do enough for me  and as a fledgling solo  trip; I  am totally  smitten.I  am  going  back  in April as  during the  season,  Riva  is ideally situated  to  explore  this immense  lake  with  its beautiiful villages,  and up into  the medieaval villages  in  the mountains (not operating  as  well  during  the  Christmas/New  Year)  The Ferry and Bus services are  a short  walk from  the  hotel.  Walking/cycling,water-sports/magnificent sightseeing  readily  available.  I would …

title: lovely christmas break
review: Good evening,  thanks a lot for your review ! Really appreciate all your comments ! Will pass this tomorrow to the staff and they will be very happy !  See you soon or in April and if you need something, don't exitate to contact the staff or me directly.  Thanks again and enjoy your 2013 begin ! Alessandro

title: Lovely holiday
review: I stayed in this lovely old hotel from the 17th  to  the 22nd November last and I had a very enjoyable experience. Yes it is old fashioned, as some reviewers have said, but that is the essence of its charm. The staff are wonderful without exception, friendly, helpful and nothing fazes them. My room was very comfortable and spotlessly clean. The food was excellent, the portions somewhat over generous. On gala night there was a five course dinner! I must not forget to mention the star of the dining room, the delightful George, the man with the big smile for everyone, and faultless courtesy. The hotel is perfectly situated,close to the lake and the shopping area, the old town is a ten minute walk from the hotel, with a medieval fortress and a beautiful old square with lots of…

title: Excellent for Christmas Holidays
review: I just loved this hotel. The location was perfect, with the town 2 minutes one way, lake 2 minutes the other direction and beautiful walks, parks adn scenery the other direction. Very picturesque setting. Ideal setting for a wonderful Christmas holiday. All of the staff members were fabulous, especially at the front desk. They were very friendly and helpful throughout our visit. Very courteous and went over and beyond to help with any of our needs. I would definitely recommend this hotel and will most likely be travelling here again.

title: ideally situated hotel
review: Good afternoon and thanks !  Happy to read that you enjoyed our Christmas Holiday ! We try to make our Guest with the same feeling that they can find at home ! Hope to see you soon with us again !  Thanks and Happy New Year !

title: Great Hotel in Great Position
review: we enjoyed our stay here for 4 nights at this very nicely situated hotel. Just 5 mins walk straight ahead to the lakeside and 2 minute walk to the right to the old town. The reception and breakfast staff were all pleasant and helpful. The breakfast was good and varied. The downstairs pool ans sauna was very smart and relaxing. It was even nice just chilling on the outside eating area which overlooks the outdoor pool and garden. We really enjoyed our stay and found Riva to be a lovely place with plenty of other close by places of interest to visit. The only problem we had and it has nothing to do with the hotel was the bus ride back to Verona for our flight. It was a boling hot nightmare in intense heat with no  aircon at all for over 2 hours. In summer dont believe how short the…

title: Excellent
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot !  Really happy to read that you enjoyed your stay in our hotel and you liked everything :)  Hope to see you again in spring, summer or autumn !  Thanks and have a nice 2013 beginning !

title: Excellent service
review: We stayed here from the 22nd to 29th September with the Travel Department who i have used on previous escorted holidays, and again their staff (Renatta and Mario) where upto the high standard you now expect from this Company. On to the Hotel, it was in a great position for everything, the Staff in the Dining Room (George & Co.) where fantastic, nothing was too much bother for them, and being in a foreign country unable to speak their language, their "english" was great. The food was very good with plenty of choice, buffet at Breakfast and A-La-Carte in the Evening. Our room on Floor 2 was of a good size, the bathroom was moderate and it was cleaned on a daily basis. I would highly recommend this Hotel for a visit to Riva-del-Garda.

title: Wonderfully Hotel
review: I have just booked to return to this wonderful hotel. I have stayed many times over the past few years and can honestly say the staff are all so kind and helpful. The food is excellent and plenty of it (take bigger clothes)  The location is great only a 5min stroll into the centre of Riva and it's lovely caffes restaurants and bars not to mention the shops lol Catch a boat and visit all the other lovely places on the lake and people watch with a glass of Prosecco or a Gelato (or both)  So looking forward to May

title: Good hotel but get the right room
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot !  Your review is very welcome and always important for us ! Really nice to see that you come here many time and you appreciate our staff, our food and our hotel all.  Hope to see you again soon, we are always open 365 days a year !  Thanks

title: LOVELY HOTEL, EXCELLENT SERVICE AND BEAUTIFUL PART OF THE WORLD
review: we had a little bother getting a good room at arrival. Our booking was for a top floor double room with skylight - be careful - the skylight was the only window in the room - therefore not very pleasant and impossible to see out - bit of a con if you ask me! For 20€ we changed to a room with a normal window and a view of an office block and the beds were apart and we had to wait a few hours before we got sorted - a bit annoying when it's your honeymoon!!  The bathroom was very small and shower a bit worn.  After this hitch you want to foget but you feel a bit angry. The hotel itself is big with a decent spa and pool and massages for normal prices. It's very near to the centre of Riva de Garda and wifi free.  The breakfast was very impressive the next day - all you can imagine…

title: Lovely Hotel and Excellent Service
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot !  We suggest Guest want to book to check directly on the website and see the picture of the rooms and ask before booking if you need something special.   Sorry for let you waiting for the room ready  Thanks and see you again

title: Cannot fault this hotel
review: I stayed here with two friends in September 2012 having travelled with the Travel Department.  One of the party was able to get a single room at no extra charge which helped enormously as three ladies sharing a room can be time consuming ie showering etc.,  The hotel is beautiful although our rooms on the ground floor were quite dated but I would say spotlessly clean.  Another of our group with the Travel Dept., was in a suite at no extra charge which made us quite envious but which it seems was just the luck of the draw.  My memory of this hotel will be the food at both breakfast and dinner and the diningroom staff which were excellent.  The way the food was presented, the choice and as one of our party was vegeterian the staff could not do enough to accommodate her food…

title: Standard old style Italian hotel
review: The hotel was built in the early part of the last century and, in keeping with other Italian hotels of this vintage, has a certain charm, at least from the outside and public areas. However this does not mask deficiencies in the product offered.  Firstly, the positives. Overwhelmingly the most positive aspect of the hotel is the staff. They are all fluent in English and very friendly. Service in the restaurant, bar and at the front desk is courteous and efficient and I could not have had a better experience.  The restaurant is a quite slick operation. The hotel does ask you to make your choice for dinner at breakfast and some might find this a bit odd but it does ensure that your meal is ready reasonably quickly after you show up at the restaurant that night. As with hotels the…

title: Good hotel well situated
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot !  We have take note about your positeves and negatives impression and will try where we can to learn about.  Thanks a lot again for your visit

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Just back from a week in the Liberty with the Travel department and I must admit it was my first but not my last coach holiday. Both Renatta and Mario were excellent and the tours a must if you are in that area. The hotel was good the room was a bit old style and a in need of a freshen up however it was clean, quiet and very easy to sleep in. The hotel staff were excellent although they we a bit pressed on the first night as they were hosting a big wedding. Breakfast was very good with a good selection of food available dinner was good but the portions could have been a bit bigger. There is a full health spa swimming pool etc all very good if you are into a health kick. It is well situated in Riva  Del Garda and the town itself is a pleasure to walk round with plenty to see and…

title: Super Hotel
review: Good afternoon and thanks !  So nice to read another wonderful comment for us ! I will speak with all staff telling that you were satisfied about food, service and cleaning !   We are working in progress to refurbish some rooms, as soon as we will have the possibility  Thanks a lot !

title: great week in lake garda
review: I stayed here in July as part of a group from the Travel Department.  I had a lovely room on the 3rd floor.  It was spacious with a very nice bathroom.  The staff were really friendly, nothing was too much trouble. Service in dining room was very efficient and the waiters were so nice especially "George".  Food was excellent with a choice of menu every night.  The pool was clean with plenty of loungers to relax on.  I can't recommend this hotel highly enough.  I had a great holiday. The Travel Department did a great job. Renate the guide was excellent  and so knowledgeable.

title: Grand Hotel Liberty
review: Home from holiday at this hotel.   We stayed in a Superior Room and we had a brilliant holiday.   The staff at this hotel are fantastic.   Friendly but professional.   Helpful, knowledgeable and they want you to have a great time.   Nothing is too much trouble.   the hotel is well situated and the garden with outdoor pool is lovely.   Breakfast on the terrace in the sun every day.   Breakfast was my favourite meal of the day.   Super selection.   Lots of fresh fruit, meats, cheese, rolls and for those who wanted it scrambled eggs and bacon.   The dinners were sometimes great and sometimes nearly great.  The maitre of the dining room and the assistant maitre run a tight ship with friendly efficiency.   The spa and indoor pool are magnificent.   Do have treatments if you can they…

title: super service
review: Good afternoon and  thanks a lot !  Everyone of the staff is happy to read your comment, and  we are all waiting you again for another wonderful holiday !  Thanks a million

title: Another comfortable stay.
review: We were a party of six pensioners who enjoyed the Hotel enormously. We must have been at the hotel the same time as Carolyn and think I recognise her and her parents.  Most of the comments I agree with the waiters were everything you would wish for but do not always get nothing seemed to be too much trouble.  If you are a meat and two veg person this is not the place for you because the food is absolutely wonderful and not a french fry in site.  Though saying that they will try and accommodate you if there is nothing on the menu you like.  It was our friends 45th wedding anniversary on the last day, the waiters made a grand entrance with a cake that had a sparkling candle on it and sang congratulations, our friends were very touched and as it was the last day of our holiday…

title: A Grand Stay at the Grand Hotel Liberty
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your review !  I will give your message to all staff and I really appreciate your comment about arriving at the 5 star at the Liberty !  We will try to do it as quicker as possible, if the economy will start again  Thanks a lot and see you again

title: Only the shower facilities let it down
review: When we arrived in Verona on September 1st we were told that it hadn't rained for 94 days. As soon as we got off the plane the heavens opened and everyone got very wet. When we arrived at the Liberty (3 hours later due to an accident at Mori) the rain was torrential.  What a start, but we were still welcomed with smiles and umbrellas. (Fortunately it only rained on 3 more days during our stay.) This was our second visit to the Liberty following the great experience we had in 2011. We know Riva very well having spent our last 12 holidays there and can honestly say that the Liberty is the best hotel in Riva (or Tobole, or Malchesine, or Limone).  The hotel had made special arrangements so that we could have the same room as last year, which was suitable for my disabilities.…

title: Great holiday
review: We stayed at the Liberty for 1 week from the 5th September. The staff were very friendly, especially those in the restaurant (Kannen in particular). My only criticism is not having the air conditioning switched on in bedrooms (controlled by reception) and chairs in bedroom could be more comfortable.  My husband thought there should be more variety at dinner - 3 or 4 choices each for starter, main and dessert, but I thought the choices were enough. The standard of cleanliness in the bedroom was excellent. I wouldn't bother with the spa in the basement again - the hairdresser there is rubbish.  In Riva itself, the ice creams are brilliant. I would recommend the gelateria under the Sole Hotel by the harbour.   We got the ferry from Riva to Lemoni which is well worth a visit.  All…

title: Great holiday, great resort,great hotel
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot !  Really appreciate your comments about our hotel, and we will check about the hairdresser for sure !  Have a nice day Thanks

title: Excellent hotel
review: We stayed at the Liberty from 22nd August 2012 for one week with the Travel Dept. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in room 220, an upgrade to a suite with lower sitting room and upper bedroom. The staff were friendly and efficient, though something occasionally went wrong with the service at dinner in the dining room. We would be happy to return to the Liberty or to recommend it to friends. Riva is simply an amazing resort with stunning scenery and beautiful lakeside walks.  If this was my hotel I would prioritise slight improvements in the following areas; Consider additional lighting to the two bedside lights in room 220, Move to more modern air conditioning controls(can only be accessed from reception) Consider why the dining room service occasionally goes wrong despite plenty…

title: HOTEL REVIEW
review: Good evening and thanks a lot for your review !  We will take note about your comments and I am sure we can see you again in room 220 or another suite :-)  Thanks and have a nice summer end !

title: Perfect Hotel in Perfect Location
review: We stayed there for one week aug 18th to 25th a group of 5. four adults and 14yr old. The Hotel was lovely and the staff were very friendly, helpful and polite. Our rooms were clean and big enough. The towels were changed everyday (twice) and cleaned everyday.  The pool area was clean and the spa was amazing! The food was delicious with a great choice our teenage son asked for pizza and fries one evening because he didn't fancy the menu, this was not a problem. Our air conditioning didn't work very well but once reported to reception this was quickly resolved.  The location of the hotel was perfect short stroll to the lake and the centre. We hired mountain bikes from an hire shop right next to the hotel. We also hired kayaks on the lakeside. There is so much to do in riva. The…

title: a good choice of hotel.
review: smart hotel in a good location just a minutes walk from the lakeside. we picked this so as mrs spike could use the indoor pool / sauna facilities which she was very happy with. lovely sitting for breakfast outside on the terrace overlooking the pool. we had an attic room which was okay and if you stood on a chair the view of the mountains was superb ! the breakfast was decent and the staff helpful. just a word of warning if you choose to travel from riva to verona airport. the bus should take 2hr 20 but in our case took 3 hr 30 due to traffic congestion in boiling hot weather with no air con at all. a great restaurant by the way was the napoli down the backstreet in the far corner of the main square. you just have to go to taste the home made tiramasu. its amazing.

title: Standard of bedrooms in this hotel
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot !  Very good to read that you were happy in our hotel ! We remind that we have different type of room, so just ask when you book what you will prefer for your holiday !  From Verona airport you can also ask a private transfer to the hotel, if the bus is too long and hotel for you ( in high season )  Thanks a lot again

title: one of our favouite holidays
review: We were 4 mature ladies who required separate rooms but what we were given were very inferior rooms looking out on the car park. When we complained to Travel Dept rep. we were not treated well. Same goes for Hotel reception staff. The standard of their single rooms is akin to a cell.  this is a very expensive holiday and we expected much better bedrooms. Also the hotel calls itself Grand and is supposed to be 4 star. Like Lake Como Hotel Cadenabria, the foyer is impressive but bedrooms are far below standard. Had a bad effect on our holiday which was otherwise very good. Would not go there again or go with Travel Dept either.

title: Very good and can do even better
review: Good afternoon and thanks for your review,  I remember the situation and just to be clear, some of your group booked a double use single, and some a proper single room, this last one without a supplement. Of course there is a difference if you pay a different price, and anyway I remember that we have showed you different rooms and in 1 single room we put an extra bed, to make a double bed. ( So if the room is suitable with a double bed is not so small ).  Of course anyway you can have your opinion on our Hotel, but is a lot far from all main Costumer's review.  Thanks a lot

title: great grand hotel liberty
review: the hotel is lovely,clean and inviting.the staff were excellent and we have a friend for life in Ivana .The meals were lovely and a good choice was always available but did miss a cup tea after dinner.Riva itself is a lovely resort with plenty going on and lots of places to visit.On a more serious note may we pass on our thoughts to you for the loss of your dear one.

title: Excellent hotel - again!
review: This summer I and my wife had suite, and it was worth of all euros. Room was very large and view was excellent. This time we tried spa and Finnish sauna, and I must say that it was the second best sauna in a world, because we have the best! (We are Finnish). The ladle which you throw water is more like a spoon, but we will come again next summer and we'll bring you a real steam ladle. Staff in this hotel is very helpful; they listen all your hopes and fulfill them. I don't know do they have meeting every morning and they check if someone is coming again, but many of them said that welcome back, and they remembered us from last summer. And this hotel was a surprise to my wife, because at first we booked an another hotel, but she liked so much this hotel so I made her surprise…

title: Lovely old style hotel
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot !!!  I am sure that all staff remember you because we are not used to change staff every year, we have staff working with us from 10-15 or 20 years ! They will remember you again also next year when you are coming back and please I am waiting a new ladle for the sauna :-)  Thanks again Alessandro

title: Loved the Grand Hotel Liberty!
review: We have just had a weeks stay in Riva, staying at the Grand Hotel Liberty. The staff were very friendly and our waiter for most of the stay was 'Kannon'. He was always very helpful and kept us entertained! He also recommended a lovely local wine. I do agree with some of the previous comments that the public rooms and areas are lovely but that the bedrooms do look a little tired! Our room was always kept very clean and tidy by the maids, but was in need of some new  bathroom fitments and update of furniture etc. The hotel is in a very convenient location ideal for the shops and the ferry port. We travelled with my elderly mother who was in a single room with a shower over the bath. The so called shower screen was about 6 inches wide and not much use. She felt very uneasy using…

title: beautiful area
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your review !  I will give the message to "Kannan" of your comment and he will appreciate it a lot I am sure ! Give you a tip for you and all for next time if you are coming with us, we also have some double/twin rooms if people are on wheelchair or having problem with the shower, just make a requests when you are doing the booking.  Thanks a lot ! Alessandro

title: july 2012
review: I stayed at the hotel from 30 June to 7 July with my mum and my son.  The hotel is beautiful.  We wanted to stay somewhere where there would be fewer younger children and this was perfect.  The staff were all lovely.  They accommodated us when we had very early morning starts, and opened the dining room so that we could have breakfast before we set out for the day.  The pools were amazing.  Never busy at all - very relaxing.  We paid 8 euros each to use the indoor spa facilities, which was well worth it!  The rooms, although in need of up-dating, were fine.  The air con did work and was essential!  The ensuite facilities were good, although the shower over baths really need bigger screens - we soaked the floor every time we had a shower as they were tiny.  Otherwise the rooms…

title: A Grand Hotel
review: My family have stayed at this hotel many times and have always been so complimentary. I decided I must go. Being a widowed lady I need a single room am mostly dissapointed at paying extra for a usually very poor room. Not so this time Room 229 was a good size, very comfortable My bed was comfortable with 3 comfortable pillows(very important to me) A lovely size Bath/shower room. huge wardrobe,free safe,Fridge,Spotless and lovely chambermaid. Clean towels every day, even changed in evening if I had used them.  I found the waiters were always very caring. The reception always cheerfully helpful. The food was very good and varied. The breakfasts had just about everything you could think of-self service-lovely fruit too. I must mention the nice young Barman who always made me a…

title: Better than 1st class
review: Good afternoon and thanks Mrs.Barton!  Nice to read that you enjoyed your stay in our hotel, we always do our best to have happy and returning Guest !  I am sure we will see you again !  Thanks Alessandro

title: Awful
review: Just returned from a walking holiday in Riva and a weeks stay at the Grand Liberty Hotel (23rd to 30th June).  The staff were friendly, polite and attentive. We arrived later than expected due to a delay at Gatwick and expected to miss our evening meal. On arrival at the hotel our bags were taken to our room and we were ushered into the dining room where a meal had been kept for us.  The food was excellent throughout our stay. Plenty of choice for both breakfast and evening meal. Breakfast could be eaten on the terrace outside the dinning room. A perfect way to start the day, breakfast in the sunshine. Our room, on the ground floor, was kept clean with towels changed on request. The bed was turned back in the evening.  The hotel had a lovely "Grand Tour" feel to it.…

title: Lovely old style hotel
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot !  Really good to read a wonderful review !! Hope to see you again in our Hotel, and maybe next time you will not find Italy playing and winning :P  Thanks a lot Alessandro

title: Had a lovely time
review: Terrible staff, rooms badly in need of rejuvenation. Altogether poor value.

title: Would like to go back
review: My husband and I had a week in Grand Hotel Liberty with the Travel Department. We had upgraded to 4 star hotel from the standard 3 star, and I'm glad we did, as the hotel had a pool and food that was probably better than the 3 star option. The location is good - close enough for easy access to the interesting bits of Riva, but quiet. The pool and pool area are good, restaurant roomy, food varied and nice (the first night there were skinny MacDonald style chips and I feared that was going to be the norm, but that was the only time there was chips - every other night there were interesting veg and potatoes, with lots of fish available, and of course pasta. Only 'complaint' - no tiramisu! We had an 'attic' room which presumably had the same floor area as the lower floors, but a…

title: Excellent doesn't do it justice!
review: Good morning and thanks !!  If you start with "would like to go back" I will finish with, when you like ??? I suggest you to check in September or October also, we are always open !  Thanks a million and have a nice summer ! Alessandro

title: Not a 4 star hotel
review: Just returned from a three night stay at the beautiful Grand Hotel Liberty (Saturday 2 June to Tuesday 5 June) and although the weather let me down the hotel, spa, food, staff, service and location exceeded expectations. We chose the half board option which was of ultra high standard and the choices excellent with three courses at dinner and a buffet breakfast. The scrambled eggs definitely deserve a mention. The staff were outstanding with a special mention to George Clooney's younger brother the maitre d', they even brought me my breakfast one morning that I was feeling unwell. The spa was a complete bonus on a rainy misty Monday morning. The sauna, steam room, tropical shower and heated pool were spotless and very well maintained. Overall I would thoroughly recommend this…

title: Excellent location
review: Good morning and thanks a lot !  What else can I say after reading a comment like this ?  THANKS THANKS THANKS A LOT !  I will pass the message to all staff and George Clooeny younger brother :-) We are all waiting to see you again in the near future !  Thanks Alessandro

title: An Excellent Holiday Hotel
review: Visited this hotel for 1 night at the start of June with my girlfriend. We found the front desk staff not exactly charming or friendly. Seems like it was a massive pain for them to actually check us in and tell us where our room was. The room itself was badly in need of update and refresh, it was clean and tidy but the air con didn't work, later we found out that air con isn't turned on until high summer. The spa and outdoor pool were the best parts. They were clean and tidy and we enjoyed that aspect of our stay. We didn't though enjoy the hot and unbearable sleeping conditions caused by the lack of air con. After a sleepless night, the breakfast was pretty good - lots of choice. Checkout and interaction with the front desk was again a tedious affair and after mentioning the…

title: A Hotel with character and charm
review: My husband and i have just returned from a week in the Grand Liberty hotel in a great location in lake Garda near supermarkets and bus stops.We travelled with the Travel Department as a group and had 3 fantastic organised trips included .I feel our guide Renata was SUPER with her charm, wit and humour not to mention her wealth of knowledge.We enjoyed our stay in the hotel and found the staff most helpful, bed rooms spotless with clean towels daily and good variety for breakfast with a bonus of hot bacon and scrambled egg.The evening meal was waiter service and the menu offered a fair choice and a substitute if not satisfied.Thank you Bruno for this added touch.We found the Spa area to be most pleasant nice pool, sauna and steam room to relax in after one of the tours which…

title: Try another option.
review: Good afternoon and thanks for your review :)  I will pass your comment to all our staff and Bruno, I am sure he will be very happy to hear that :) Have a nice summer and see you soon  Alessandro

title: Grand Hotel Liberty
review: This is NOT a four star hotel, for example a four star hotel is required to have air conditioning.  The Grand only turns on the air in the month of August.  The location is great, other than that the rooms are small, the linen old, the pillows rock hard, the rooms hot and noisy, and the breakfast average.

title: Fantastic holiday, thanks to Travel Department
review: Good afternoon and thanks for your review,  we always read and reply also not very good comments and hope to learn something and improve in the future.  Sorry to read what you are writing, but our air-con will work from June and not only in August, I don't know who tell you false.  I am sure bed linen are always checked and we change them when they are not anymore new and the breakfast I am sure you can find everything you need and everything is good, just have a look at many other comments on it.  We have many type of room overlooking the front or the back, please next time you are coming ask to change your room  for another one, we always try to satisfy our Guest in any case.  Thanks a lot again Alessandro

title: Old Style Charm and Elegance
review: We travelled with the Travel Department on a walking / sightseeing holiday. On the positive side this hotel has many good features - The Hotel has great 'character' and is ideally located in Riva Del Garda, The Hotel is spotlesly clean with lovely well maintained gardens and surrounds. The food in the Hotel is quite good. The use of bedroom safes is free with no deposit required for the key. Use of the internet on the hotel computer is very reasonable, approx €2 for 6 days if you dont have a laptop with you.  The staff are very professional and helpful/friendly. Fulvia Perini is the Travel Department Resort Administrator and she is very helpful and friendly. The 2 guides for the walks / hikes - Fabrizio and Nino? Dino ? (Sorry not sure of the name) were excellent and they are…

title: Classic Hotel in Beautiful setting
review: My husband & I spent a week in Grand Hotel Liberty with the travel Department last year, It was a truly beautiful experience staying at the hotel.  The staff couldn't be nicer. The room was beautifully decorated in a very Italian style!  The location was so good for taking walks all along the lake to the next town, or even bicycling as so many people took to the bikes. (The very fit ones I might add). You could even take boat trips to all the little towns dotted  around the lake.  I would go back to this hotel again in the future. Caroline Southern Ireland

title: travel department
review: Good afternoon,  thanks a lot for your review ! Hope to see you again after a couple of years :)

title: Wonderful holiday
review: just back yesterday stayed at riva del garda in grand hotel liberty with the travel dept.this was a surprise for my 65th birthday and it was wonderful.both my husband and myself were stunned by the beauty of the place and the hotel from basement up was great rooms, food, staff.bruno is so pleasant and gentlemanly,give him a raise ha ha.would recommend this hotel to everyone and met great people also our guide renata knew her stuff and was really funny as well.thanks travel dept,hotel liberty staff and renata for a wonderful time

title: Excellent location, lovely staff, reasonable for dietary requirements
review: Good afternoon and thanks :-)  Really nice to read that you enjoyed Hotel, Riva and sorroundings ! I will pass your message to Staff and Bruno, they will be happy for sure.  Thanks and see you Alessandro

title: Excellent hotel
review: We spent a week at this hotel and loved every minute of it.  The rooms are small and the furniture is very basic but the main eating area and bars are beautiful. Didn't get a chance to use the spa but it looked wonderful.  The staff in the hotel are all lovely - especially the staff in the restaurant.  We went with the 'Travel Department' holiday group and were very well looked after.  Our guide Antoniette (not sure of the spelling) was terrific and had a wealth of knowledge.  She also had a great sense of humour.  Would highly recommend the hotel and the travel group.  Lake Garda is so beautiful and the views in Riva Del Garda are just breathtaking.

title: Excellent Holiday
review: We've just returned from a great weeks  holiday in Riva Del Garda staying at The Liberty. The hotel is in the center of Riva and is an ideal location for exploring Lake Garda by either bus or Ferry.The hotel itself is very comfortable. The food is excellent with a good choice  both for breakfast and dinner. It was particularly nice to have waiter service instead of the buffet style meals. The waiters were very proffessional and extremely friendly .Our waiter for most of the time was Bruno who had a great sense of humour.In fact all the staff were friendly and helpful.We met some lovely people and had some good nights in the bar with them and Dominic the bartender.We went with The Travel Department for the first time and were very impressed.The trips to Venice ,Verona and the…

title: Great location, Impressive building
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your stay in our hotel and for your review !  I will pass all the compliments to our staff, they will appreciate it a lot for sure  Thanks again and see you again Alessandro

title: EXCELLENT!  GREAT FOR A BREAK.
review: This hotel is in an ideal location for exploring Lake Garda and the Dolomites. Our Group was booked to have a hot meal on arrival, we got there after a eally long day travelling at approx 9.10pm to be told that there would only be a cold plate of salad style meat and cheese!! not a great end to a tiring day, the receptionist was very off and very abrupt. The rest of the staff were great, The food for the rest of our stay was good, several choices for the evening meal and a large selection for breakfast. The room was of a good standard we even had a small balcony.

title: trip to lake garda italy
review: Good morning and thanks a lot for you review !  We really appreciate you liked the area and our hotel, and we hope to see you again in the near future.  We usually give to groups arriving late a hot soup and a cold plate with ham, cheese and a bit of salad, because we have seen with experience that mainly people after  a long day and tired, prefer to eat something easy.  Anyway we will take your note in our records. Thanks a lot again  Alessandro

title: Confused!!!
review: We travelled with a group for a week in March. Having read some reviews prior to our journey, we were a little apprehensive.  To our pleasant surprise, we found the Hotel was lovely. Food was excellent and a good choice.  We were even accomodated on our 6am trip one morning! Our room was perfect! The staff very friendly. The hotel is situated centrally and you can walk to the shops nearby, or take a stroll after dinner.  We would definitely return, although perhaps a little later in the year, as we were a little early in the season. The boat trip on the lake was not yet available.  Thank you to everyone! GOOD LUCK!

title: Had a lot of charm
review: I stayed in the Grand Hotel Liberty, Riva Del Garda, on a group tour from Ireland.   First impressions - wow!!! very impressive position and frontage.  However I was there in early March and the weather was rubbish - must go again in the summer when I can enjoy the gardens and the location.   Room - I was on my own and had a single room - was adequate.   I was at the side of the hotel with a view over the conference centre/function room and car park and an apartment block.   The room was fine.   I was a smoker at the time of my visit and so could not smoke in the room - and would not.   So I used to go down to the covered terrace area on the ground floor for a smoke.    This was fine most of the time but the morning I woke early and scared the hell out of one of the poor hotel…

title: Single rooms need updating
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your review.  I hope I can see you again in July or August when you can enjoy the pool, garden and the lake ! I only like to say that I don't think our bar area is small ( it's around 350 square meter ). Sometime is take by weddings but only for the cocktail, more or less 1 hour, and you can always use our lounge area to sit or our terrace ( if weather helps )  Thanks a lot and see you again Alessandro

title: Very nice hotel!
review: I stayed in the hotel grand liberty as part of a group for the new year holiday period. The hotel is in a very central location for the town.  The room assigned to me was located on the upper floor overlooking a side car park. The room was adequate however was very dark due to the dark furniture. The single bed is quiet small more suitable for a child than an adult. The corridor outside had frayed carpet and extemely dark wood.  The restaurant was spacious and the staff extremely friendly expecially Bruno. I do not eat certain meats ie pork, vension and veal and this appear frequently on the dinner menu thus chicken and chips each night.  The breakfast had a good selection to cater for all tastes ie fruit, cereals, continental breakfast and streaky rashers and egg  ( the eggs…

title: very enjoyable five day stay
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your review  I like to thank you for your positive comment about Staff, Hotel and Breakfast I only like to mention that our breakfast eggs are made from fresh product and not powder.  We give a full choice of menu for everyone, vegetarian, diabetic or other and you can always ask for something different if the menu doesn't suit your needs.  We are starting project to rebuild rooms in this winter, if economy helps us.  Thanks a lot Alessandro

title: Grand Liberty Hotel
review: My husband and I stayed at the Grand Hotel Liberty for one night.  The location is very good, very close walking to the lake and to the city center.  We were able to park our car right on the property at no extra charge. The staff was very helpful and kind until it was time to check-out. We were questioned about not having brought down our bath towels and bath robes (well first, we were never given bath robes when we checked in, and second, I have never heard of needing to bring your bath towels to check-out).  Although our room was very outdated, it  was very clean and a good size.  The rate included breakfast which was a typical continental breakfast but they also had scrambled eggs and bacon, a big treat for Italy!

title: Excellent hotel!
review: Me and my wife visited in this lovely hotel last summer. We had attic room, I thought that it might be a little small, because it was so cheap, and I was so wrong!! Attic room was very big depending price. Service was excellent, staff was very helpful. Only thing what would be better is going to Spa. We'd like to go sauna, but it was a little bit difficult, so we skipped sauna. Next summer we reserved a suite for us, see you then!

title: To much "Liberty" compared to the price.
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your reply !!  All our standard and attic rooms are of same size, the difference is between the location in the hotel. We are very happy to look that you booked our suite for next holiday ! See you then and also please try to use our SPA that is absolutely relaxing !  Thanks a lot again Alessandro

title: 2 fried eggs and streaky bacon.
review: I would reccomend the Hotel just for the wellness center which is very nice.

title: ALANORA
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your reply !  Unfortunately you didn't write a lot about your title, like which kind of room you booked and at which price. We cannot give any reply right now, sorry ! Hope to see you again and thanks for your comment about our wellness center !  Thanks again Alessandro

title: A fantastic holiday
review: We stayed for three nights as part of a cruise holiday with the Travel Dept.  The hotel is    very old but very clean and comfortable. However the food is very average and on the     dinner menu on one night was 2 fried eggs and streaky rashers.  The air conditioning    was not working and as the weather was very warm, the dining room at night was     sweltering.  I was told by staff that it was turned off for the winter. They could not turn it on    again. The head waiter, a George Clooney look a like was a gentleman and very helpful.    Overall, an interesting experience.......

title: Mixed reactions
review: Arrived here for a week's break.  I'd agree with some of the other reviewers in that the place was spotless, with plenty of staff.  Meals... too much like school dinners generally, with cool, overly greasy food.  I wouldn't have been happy to pay 25 euros a head for most of them.  The gala dinner, where there was no choice, was terrific by comparison.  My room was dated but clean, and air-con was available on request though very noisy in operation, especially overnight.  Extraneous noise late at night was a problem from neighbouring properties, I think - though a complaint did seem to bring peace.  The bathroom needs an immediate upgrade: - severely cracked tiles; a ledge behind the bath that held a huge puddle of water after showering; and the 6inch shower screen that screened…

title: A great stay
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your review !  Really sorry to see that you didn't like our dinner choice in the evening, we mostly have good comments about that, but I will take note of yours and check what was happening that week. We are also going to refurbish some rooms shortly and of course make some maintenance in the rooms, sorry about that  Thanks and hope to see you again with us Alessandro

title: Pity about the rooms
review: stayed at the hotel for a week in September and booked a standard room. The location of the hotel is very good. A short walk to the town and lake.   On our arrival the hotel looked great from the outside. We checked in with the receptionist who was friendly and helpful and went to our room to unpack. We walked through a very nice and clean lobby area with lots of comfy chairs and went to our room. I opened the door and was met with a vision of green. The walls, the furniture all painted the same very boring colour. The bed spread was a different green but all in all I have to say it was a very boring decorated room . That aside it was spacious and there was plenty of green wardrobe space. It had a tv, a mini bar a small safe and the bed was large and comfy. It had no view to…

title: What a Wonderful Holiday.
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your review !  I see that you are happy about everything about our hotel, we are going to make some works about the rooms on the back side of the hotel, as you say need something to do soon  Thanks a lot and waiting to see you again next time Alessandro

title: Grand Style in the Liberty
review: We travelled to the Grand Hotel Liberty on the 13/September 2011 as a group of six two of us had stayed there five years ago and we brought four of our friends for a seven night brake.The service we received was second to none all the staff were very friendly and nothing was to much trouble for them.The location of this Hotel is fab,right in the beautifull town of Riva.Pity about the rooms two of our group had to be moved from their room because the shower screen was very small and the  water went all over the floor when showering, and the door onto the balcony would not close,our room number 128 the shower door fell off,the wardrobe door fell off ,both thes items were attended to very promptly but the wardrobe door fell off again,it was nearly impossible to sit on the toilet…

title: La Dolce Vita
review: The whole ambience of the Grand Hotel Liberty gave one a taste of the 'Good life'. The architectural style of the hotel was from the days of the Grand Tour, with the good old fashioned service to match and food to suit a duke's banquet but with wonderful State of the Art facilities. Floating in the balmy waters of the pool, nothing to see but a cloudless sky with eagles soaring above the cliffs is the nearest thing to bliss!

title: great hotel
review: Good afternoon and thanks a lot for your review !  It is always happy to read something like this :) Hope to see you again in our hotel maybe with friends Thanks  Alessandro

title: Great Honeymoon & would love to go back
review: we stayed in hotel Liberty for a week It was wonderful the hotel was spotless the staff were amazing really friendly and efficent  the hotel main area is lovely and the swimming pool area is lovely too    some of the bedrooms were a little old fashioned and in need of a make over our bathroom was lovely and roomy and the only little problem we had was that we discovered we couldn't close our bedroom door when inside as it was a fire door apart from that is was one of the best places I have stayed in a brilliant location too

title: Great food and fantasic location
review: Good morning and thanks a lot for your review !  Hope to see you again in Riva and in our hotel, and we will  have a look at the door and try to solve the problem if we can  Thanks again Alessandro

title: Fabulous hotel with great staff, food and location.
review: My new wife & myself spent 7 glorious nights at the Liberty Hotel in Riva Lake Garda. Upon checking in we were surprisingly updated to the hotel's suite, a lovely gesture. The suite as you can imagine was more than enough in size to meet our needs. It had a balcony that afforded a view of the swimming pool below & the beautiful mountains that surround Lake Garda. We had booked on a half board basis & went with the intention of eating out for most of the week, however after trying the restaurant in the hotel on the first night we found the food lovely & the service excellant. As a result we only ventured out to nearby restaurants on 2 of our 7 nights. The hotel is spotlesssly clean & all the staff are extremely friendly. I have already recommended this hotel & Riva, Lake Garda to…

title: Once and once only
review: We visited this hotel in July and were very impressed with Riva Del Garda and surrounding areas but not the hotel. In my opinion this is not a 4 star hotel. The staff are excellent and friendly the location of the hotel is brilliant .The hotel itself is very clean and the provision of a gym and an indoor pool and wellness centre are bonuses.However the rooms are drab and tired with old musty furniture and poorly decorated if at all.The food was below average, with  breakfast being woeful to poor. The evening meal was a slight improvement but only slight although the staff tried their hardest to make it enjoyable for the patrons.We hope to return to Riva Del Garda sometime in the future but not that we know we will not being staying at this hotel.

title: Still Fantastic

review: I hadnt been back to riva for 2 years and i went back last july to see the grand hotel liberty and it just gets better and better! I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is visiting this area.  The service is really good and the staff are excellent - nothing is too much trouble.

We anyway know that we have to make this change in the near future at the system.  The check out time is at 10am, like in many hotels in the town (with some exception) but if we can, if we don’t shortly the room, we can also extend the check out time, just ask at reception and we try to accept your request.
